alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Lee; Van Buren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 9:48AM CST until February 16 at 9:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. All snow is expected after Noon today. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northwest and west central Illinois, southeast Iowa and northeast Missouri. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. North winds gusting up to 35 MPH may cause blowing and drifting snow, especially in open and rural areas. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
